metadata.title: CVE-2020-24392 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: In voloko twitter-stream 0.1.10, missing TLS hostname validation allows an attacker to perform a man-in-the-middle attack against users of the library (because eventmachine is misused).

criterions.comment: ruby-twitter-stream package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
